this is the shit ... i'm a Tomb Raider fan also ... i have all the 13 games of Tomb Raider for pc :

... about the release ...

i like how although is on the same engine as TR 4 , the look is more as TR 6 combined with TR 7 ... but the graphics are pretty good  .. if u're a fan u should play this ... thank you man ... and i'll let u know if i find some bugs

... and i can't wait no more for ... 

Tomb Raider 9 - Turning Point
Sorry about the misleading title, Fading Light is a fan made game based on the TR4 engine, you can get others like it, just google trle. Cheers.
